name: Cowterpult
description:
This game was made in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2018. The theme was transmission, and we wanted to do something relating to the transmission of diseases. We had to make it zany, though- so we looked to the history of humanity and biological warfare, where diseased corpses were often used as weapons. 

INSTRUCTIONS

Keyboard: WSAD to aim, hold space to pull the slingshot back- and release to fire. M for map.

 Xbox 360/One controller: left stick to aim, A to fire, Y for map.

 Aim for the houses; whoever accumulates the most hits wins!

CREDITS

Programming & Design: Eleanor McMurtry

3D props and technical artistry: James Smith

2D art/textures & Cow model: Gabriel Morgan

Audio: Matt Schenkel and Caitlin Hopwood, featuring moos from Eleanor, James, Rose & Tamara Partridge (the famed French cow)
